titleStmt.title: The tragedy of Antigone, the Theban princesse. Written by T.M.
Antigone.
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sould at his shop, at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate,

note.p: The first leaf is blank except for an ornament.
With a final colophon leaf; the last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
